title: Update homepage with Clean Claim Intelligence and Knowledge Board information

requirements.text: Add a dedicated section to the homepage highlighting the Clean Claim Intelligence solution with key messaging about the 10-layer validation system and revenue protection benefits

quotes: Upgrade homepage based upon new information added

acceptanceCriteria: Clean Claim Intelligence section appears on homepage with visual prominence
Section includes reference to 10-layer validation intelligence
Section includes link or CTA to navigate to /clean-claim-intelligence page
Content emphasizes revenue cycle management and claim accuracy benefits

requirements.text: Add a Knowledge Board section to the homepage promoting the hospital licensing and regulatory compliance resources with link to the knowledge board page

quotes: Upgrade homepage based upon new information added

acceptanceCriteria: Knowledge Board section appears on homepage
Section references hospital licensing and regulatory compliance topics
Section includes CTA or link to navigate to /knowledge-board page
Visual design maintains consistency with existing homepage sections

requirements.text: Ensure the updated homepage sections integrate seamlessly with existing auto-rotating hero carousel, why-choose-us section, solutions cards, and metrics display without disrupting current functionality
acceptanceCriteria: All existing homepage sections remain functional
New sections follow the established Royal Teal color scheme and design patterns
Page layout remains responsive across mobile and desktop
Demo booking modal continues to work from all CTAs

constraints: Do not modify the existing auto-rotating hero carousel functionality
Maintain the current Royal Teal color scheme and design language
Preserve all existing CTAs and demo booking functionality
Keep the chatbot component integration intact
nonGoals: Modifying the Clean Claim Intelligence page content
Changing the Knowledge Board page structure
Altering backend data models or API endpoints
